snippet: A fiery Rick Santorum urged Colorado Republicans to "reset this race," ramping up efforts to cast himself as a more conservative alternative to Mitt Romney and Newt Gingrich.
abstract: A fiery Rick Santorum urged Colorado Republicans to "reset this race," ramping up efforts to cast himself as a more conservative alternative to Mitt Romney and Newt Gingrich.
lead_paragraph: DENVER - In desperate need of a strong showing in coming caucuses, a fiery Rick Santorum urged Colorado Republicans on Wednesday morning to "reset this race," ramping up efforts to cast himself as a more conservative alternative to Mitt Romney and Newt Gingrich.

headline.main: Santorum Urges Colorado to 'Reset This Race'
